Class XYMesh

extends Routing

    • Method Detail

      • calcOutputPort

        public int calcOutputPort(Topology topology,
                 int src_tile,
                 int dst_tile)
        Description copied from class: Routing
        Evaluates the output port ID required to reach the next hop. It should be called in every hop along the path.
        Specified by:
        calcOutputPort in class Routing
        Parameters:
        topology - The topology
        src_tile - The tile of the optical router
        dst_tile - The destination tile
        Returns:
        The ID of the output port
